text:
@realDonaldTrump Yes, be sure to sign your "CORONAVIRUS WAVIER". Many thousands at the Ralley are Subject to getting CORONAVIRUS.
Mask wearing is not expected to be mandated at this event. Some will skip this out of Health Concerns with No Vaccine available but Trump's Ego needs massaged now.
